LanguageData.KTDryadFlower.title: цветок
LanguageData.KTDryadFlower.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a loving flower of a dryad. [PAWN_nameDef] seems to radiate a warming heat.
LanguageData.KTDryadWeird.title: странная
LanguageData.KTDryadWeird.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] seems to be irrational, with sporadic movements and actions. [PAWN_nameDef] seems to sway with the wind.
LanguageData.KTDryadAgreeable.title: покладистая
LanguageData.KTDryadAgreeable.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] seems to be agreeable for a dryad.
LanguageData.KTDryadCold.title: равнодушная
LanguageData.KTDryadCold.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is cold like the truest essensce of nature. [PAWN_nameDef] is seen as cruel by man and it does little to correct it.
LanguageData.KTDryadHarsh.title: резкая
LanguageData.KTDryadHarsh.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is harsh and viscious. Seemingly ready to pounce on all and everything, if [PAWN_nameDef] wishes to.
LanguageData.KTDryadHostile.title: враждебная
LanguageData.KTDryadHostile.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is hostile to almost anything. [PAWN_nameDef] hates man and everything mankind brings.
LanguageData.KTDryadWildrose.title: дикая роза
LanguageData.KTDryadWildrose.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is seemingly hostile and cold, but with the right actions [PAWN_nameDef] would be able bud out into a beautiful rose.
LanguageData.KTDryadMagic.title: невообразимая
LanguageData.KTDryadMagic.baseDesc: What [PAWN_nameDef] is or was is not clear.
